name: The Missing Piece: A Puzzle-Solving Adventure
name_original: The Missing Piece: A Puzzle-Solving Adventure
description: In "The Missing Piece", players take on the role of Jack Griffon, an amnesiac protagonist on a journey to uncover the truth about their past. As they explore immersive environments, they must use their problem-solving skills and quick thinking to piece together the missing pieces of their identity and solve the mystery of their amnesia. Along the way, they will uncover clues and secrets hidden within their apartment and the lobby of an apartment building, discover a pay statement from a company called PCL Pharmaceuticals, and delve into the inner workings of a mysterious project called "Project Griffon". With a captivating storyline and challenging puzzle-solving gameplay, "The Missing Piece" offers a thrilling and memorable gaming experience.
